item.title: Rubio Visits Panama Canal
item.description: On his first foreign trip as secretary of state, Marco Rubio met with President José Raúl Mulino and visited the Panama Canal.

item.title: Crews Lift Wreckage From D.C. Plane Crash Out of Potomac
item.description: A crane was removing the fuselage of the American Airlines jet, which crashed into the river last week after colliding with a U.S. Army helicopter.

item.title: French Court Convicts Director Christophe Ruggia in #MeToo Case
item.description: Christophe Ruggia was sentenced to four years and fined for sexually assaulting the actress Adèle Haenel when she was a minor.

item.title: How Costs for Online Sales After Trump’s Trade Move
item.description: President Trump’s tariff measures included a significant change to trade rules that could increase costs for many products bought online, including on...

item.title: With Trump’s Backing Uncertain, Europe Scrambles to Shore Up Its Own Defenses
item.description: European leaders will gather Monday to plot a rough path forward on defense. Wavering support from President Trump is likely to drive the debate.
